comments.text:
STR:
 * In a new tab,
 * visit http://google.com, then
 * visit http://mozilla.org by typing the new address into the location bar.
 * Now right-click the back button.

Expected results:
 * Both entries in the resulting menu have favicons.

Actual results:
 * Only the Google favicon is displayed.
comments.raw_text:
STR:

Actual results:
